languages.text: "Это необходимо для конспирации. Уверяю, все мои люди без страха и сомнений рискнут семьями ради блага династии фон Валанциус!"
"It is necessary for the sake of secrecy. Let me assure you: all of my people will gladly risk their families for the good of the von Valancius dynasty, without fear or hesitation!"
languages.original_text: "Это необходимо для конспирации. Уверяю, все мои люди без страха и сомнений рискнут семьями ради блага династии фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: "This is necessary for the sake of secrecy. Let me assure you that all my people will risk their families without fear or hesitation for the good of the von Valancius dynasty!"
"This is necessary for the sake of secrecy. Let me assure you that all my people will risk their families without fear or hesitation for the good of the von Valancius dynasty!"

"It is necessary for the sake of secrecy. Let me assure you: all of my people will gladly risk their families for the good of the von Valancius dynasty, without fear or hesitation!"

languages.text: "Es ist notwendig, um die Geheimhaltung zu wahren. Ich versichere Euch: Alle meine Leute setzen für das Wohl der Dynastie derer von Valancius gerne ihre Familien aufs Spiel, ohne Angst oder Zögern!"
languages.original_text: "It is necessary for the sake of secrecy. Let me assure you: all of my people will gladly risk their families for the good of the von Valancius dynasty, without fear or hesitation!"

traits.locale_text: "Es ist notwendig, um die Geheimhaltung zu wahren. Ich versichere Euch: Alle meine Leute setzen für das Wohl der Dynastie derer von Valancius gerne ihre Familien aufs Spiel, ohne Angst oder Zögern!"

languages.text: «Será necesario si queremos que el engaño funcione. Quédese {mf|tranquilo|tranquila}: ¡mi gente arriesgaría gustosa a sus familias, sin temor ni duda alguna, por el bien de la dinastía von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: "It is necessary for the sake of secrecy. Let me assure you: all of my people will gladly risk their families for the good of the von Valancius dynasty, without fear or hesitation!"

traits.locale_text: «Será necesario si queremos que el engaño funcione. Quédese {mf|tranquilo|tranquila}: ¡mi gente arriesgaría gustosa a sus familias, sin temor ni duda alguna, por el bien de la dinastía von Valancius!».

languages.text: 「秘密保持のために必要なこと。言っておくけど、うちの部下は皆、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝のためなら、恐れやためらいなく、喜んで家族を危険にさらす！」
languages.original_text: "It is necessary for the sake of secrecy. Let me assure you: all of my people will gladly risk their families for the good of the von Valancius dynasty, without fear or hesitation!"

traits.locale_text: 「秘密保持のために必要なこと。言っておくけど、うちの部下は皆、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝のためなら、恐れやためらいなく、喜んで家族を危険にさらす！」

languages.text: “为了不露马脚，这是必要的安排。我可以向您保证，我手下所有人都愿意为了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的利益牺牲自己至亲至爱之人，没有一丝畏惧、犹豫！”
languages.original_text: "It is necessary for the sake of secrecy. Let me assure you: all of my people will gladly risk their families for the good of the von Valancius dynasty, without fear or hesitation!"

traits.locale_text: “为了不露马脚，这是必要的安排。我可以向您保证，我手下所有人都愿意为了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的利益牺牲自己至亲至爱之人，没有一丝畏惧、犹豫！”

languages.text: « C'est indispensable si nous voulons donner le change. Je vous assure que tous mes hommes sont prêts à exposer leurs familles sans hésitation pour servir les intérêts de la dynastie von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "It is necessary for the sake of secrecy. Let me assure you: all of my people will gladly risk their families for the good of the von Valancius dynasty, without fear or hesitation!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est indispensable si nous voulons donner le change. Je vous assure que tous mes hommes sont prêts à exposer leurs familles sans hésitation pour servir les intérêts de la dynastie von Valancius. »

languages.text: "Gizlilikten ödün vermemek için gerekli. Sizi temin ederim ki emrimdeki herkes, korku ya da tereddüt olmaksızın von Valancius hanedanlığının iyiliği için ailelerini memnuniyetle riske atar!"
languages.original_text: "It is necessary for the sake of secrecy. Let me assure you: all of my people will gladly risk their families for the good of the von Valancius dynasty, without fear or hesitation!"
